title: Pt Access Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL) in Jul 2023
Interview Descriptions: Great. It went fast and I received alot of information. I am looking for day shift and would like to know the hourly pay for this shift in this department.
Interview Questions: why do you want to work here

title: Unit Secretary Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare
Interview Descriptions: Standard process, application then in person interview followed by a brief walk through of the job protocols and the unit itself. It was a good way to really understand the position, however the pay was just not what i was expecting and I declined the offer.
Interview Questions: Strengths, weaknesses, 5 year plan, basic interview questions

title: Clinical Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare
Interview Descriptions: Systematic and organized. It was done on time and very professional. They contacted me after the interview with regards to the offer and the hiring process. Everything was smoothy done.
Interview Questions: Why you decided to apply in our company?

title: Patient Care Assistant (PCA) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare in Nov 2022
Interview Descriptions: The process was super chill, they did not ask many questions and most of them were about prior work experiences and why I wanted to work at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare.
Interview Questions: Q: Describe your prior experience in healthcare.

title: Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL) in Sept 2022
Interview Descriptions: i think it went well and i think it was a good experience to get this interview and be able to figure out the work environment that was involved with it.
Interview Questions: What are your strengths and weaknesses?

title: Monitor Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare in Aug 2022
Interview Descriptions: Great interview! The very helpful Manager guided me through the whole process. HR was however unresponsive and has yet to answer my questions on my inquiries. However, i was still encouraged to reapply after graduating from Nursing school.
Interview Questions: What was my previous experience? why was i interested in the role?

title: HIM Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL) in Jul 2022
Interview Descriptions: Interview went really well and the hiring managers were really nice. So it made the interview process go smoothly. I can tell the department was friendly and everyone gets alone with one another.
Interview Questions:
Strengths and weaknesses question
What is your 5 year long term goal?
Tell me about yourself?
Why did you apply for this position?

title: Scrub Tech Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare
Interview Descriptions: great experience, super nice and upfront about expectations. I would recommend this facility. loved working here and fellow staff. they had great communication with me throughout the entire process and explained my duties clearly
Interview Questions: what salary I expect to get

title: Lab Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL) in Oct 2021
Interview Descriptions: Interviewers were kind and funny, create a very comforting and nurturing environment. After about 3 days HR will reach out and schedule a time to discuss pay, paperwork, and references.
Interview Questions: What are your career goals?

title: Ekg Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL) in Jul 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very interesting and family-like. Those who interviewed me made sure that I was comfortable and informed on what my task consisted of. As well as finding a time that was manageable for me as a college student.
Interview Questions: Have I worked in this field before?

title: Accounting Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL) in May 2021
Interview Descriptions: Two interviews, one with members of the ground floor level accounting team and one with two senior accountants. Both on different days. Team described the specifics of the position and what tasks I would be taking on.
Interview Questions: What was the most difficult situation you've ever faced?

title: Medical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare
Interview Descriptions: Very simple. No questions asked. Just given a tour and a basic description of my expectations as a TMH employee. Everyone seemed really nice and there was no salary discussed referred to Hr.
Interview Questions: None/basic description of job given

title: Patient Care Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare
Interview Descriptions: Interview was not hard, it was over the phone and I think I had the position already and just were calling to confirm details. I am not sure if that is how it always is, or if they really desperately needed staff.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself (typical interview stuff)

title: Physician Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare
Interview Descriptions: Had a phone call with a physician in my specialty, then internal recruiter contacted me and set up a site visit. Interviewed with hospital leadership and then with physicians in my specialty.
Interview Questions: Ties to the area

title: Summer Nurse Extern Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare
Interview Descriptions: Very friendly staff! Easy application process. Staff really care about the students to receive the best opportunities. They really work with you in regards to your school schedule. Enjoyed my experience thoroughly!
Interview Questions: What were the top three areas I wanted to work on.

title: Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL) in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview process is a multi-stage process for hiring new employees. The interview process typically includes the following steps: writing a job description, posting a job, scheduling interviews, conducting preliminary interviews, conducting in-person interviews, following up with candidates and making a hire.
Interview Questions: why do you want to work for us

title: IT Network Analyst II Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL) in Nov 2020
Interview Descriptions: It was conducted over Zoom and the process we very informative and effective. I was pleased with the length of time it took to complete the interview and as well as the feedback provided.
Interview Questions: Where do I see myself within the company in 5 years?

title: Patient Care Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL) in Aug 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was fairly easy. The team was super friendly during the process and made it seem like more of a conversation than an interview. There was an initial phone interview and then an in-person interview
Interview Questions: Why would you be a good match with TMH?

title: Patient Care Assistant (PCA) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL) in Jul 2020
Interview Descriptions: complicated but successful. hard to reach on the phone. Had to beg them to call me back. No responses about some positions. - - - - - - - - - - -
Interview Questions: Are you okay working during covid 19?

title: EHR Systems Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare
Interview Descriptions: I meet with key stakeholders pertaining the role in which I applied.  They asked very direct questions about my abilities to support providers. They wanted to know how I would handle conflict with a provider.
Interview Questions: Are you comfortable with providing oncall support?

title: Scribe Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare
Interview Descriptions: There is a phone interview in the beginning, they do not ask many questions they mostly talk about the job itself and ask you to tell them about yourself, and if you have any questions for them regarding the position.
Interview Questions: If I had any questions for them

title: Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare
Interview Descriptions: Behavioral interview and discussed experience and what you could add to the business. Asked generic interview question to make sure experience and fit aligned with what they were asking for.
Interview Questions: How would you fit into TMH culture

title: Ect Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare in Dec 2019
Interview Descriptions: It was a panel interview with a nurse supervisor and the emergency room director.  They took turns asking various questions. In total, the interview didn't last more than 30 minutes
Interview Questions: Asked about the prior experience? a time where you had to handle conflict and how that was handeled?

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare
Interview Descriptions: I applied online because I heard the whole hospital was in need of CNAs. I received a phone call from the Nurse Manager, went in for brief interview with the Nurse Manager and Assistant Nurse Manager, it was very laid back and casual. A tour of the unit followed.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself

title: Patient Care Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very simple, I submitted the application and then got an email from the assistant manager of the unit to meet. The interview was only about 5 minutes.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to be a Patient Care Assistant

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL) in Aug 2018
Interview Descriptions: The interview was typical. They let me observe the other certified nursing assistants on the floor by coming with them and letting me watch what their job responsibilities consist of. The manager then took me into her office and asked me a series of questions about past job experience and what I believe I can contribute to their team.
Interview Questions: State a time you had to handle a stressful situation in the workplace

title: Marketing and PR Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare
Interview Descriptions: It was very quick and easy. Got to talk to four different people in the office, and had a comfortable conversation with all of them about my life and future goals. We also talked about what I wanted to gain from this internship.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to learn more about Marketing and PR?

title: Project Management Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare
Interview Descriptions:
They interview very well. They are friendly and know what they are doing when you come in.

They take people from all career choices so as long as you are capable of work and dont totally mess up then you will most likely get accepted.
Interview Questions: What was a difficult problem that you had to face with another employee/student and how did you handle it?

title: IT Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL)
Interview Descriptions: No HR contact prior to interviews was very unusual.  Onsite interview with multiple Directors at the same time.  I also had a followup interview via conference call.  I had to write an email to get a response 3 weeks later to get the results from the interviews.  Unorganized process.
Interview Questions: There were no difficult questions.

title: ER EKG Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL) in Sept 2017
Interview Descriptions: Sat down with the department manager, and discussed the politics of the job and department. lasted no longer than 15 minutes and was offered the position on the spot.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL) in Jul 2017
Interview Descriptions: They basically just make sure you have a pulse, they are very big on shadowing but do not tell you everything  do not work here it is a trap and they pay nothing
Interview Questions: What experience do you have

title: Diagnostic Medical Sonographer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL)
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was professional,  two interviews the same day,  First interview with Human resources then interview with Director and Manager of Radiology and Ultrasound manager.  Heard from Human Resources within the week of the interview  and started orientation the following month.
Interview Questions: How do you feel about working with a difficult Radiologist?

title: Medical Lab Technologist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare
Interview Descriptions: Waited over a month from application submission to interview scheduled. The actual interview process was quick, general questions towards previous experience, no situation problem solving type of questions asked. Interviewers in the lab were friendly, specific about the job tasks and expectations.
Interview Questions: What motivated you to apply for this position

title: Surgical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL)
Interview Descriptions: Phone screen with a few basic questions from HR after following up a few times. Moved to the next level of having my resume/credentials reviewed by dept. manager, but had to play the waiting game. Received a call for an interview. 1:1 w/ dept manager and met some of people I would be working with.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Medical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare
Interview Descriptions: Applied online, received a phone call a few days later to come in for an interview.  The person on the phone was wonderful in describing where to go for the interview. The interview process was very easy and well organized.  Everyone was friendly and helpful.
Interview Questions: Most of the interview questions were regarding my experience.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: Interview consisted of nurse manager and assistant nurse manager. Questions were mostly behavioral type questions and very typical. Both managers were friendly and the process took less than 20 minutes.
Interview Questions: Describe a time you had a problem with a colleague. How did you handle it?

title: Clinical Dietitian Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare in Jun 2015
Interview Descriptions: After submitting an online application, an initial phone-screen interview with Human Resource Recruiter was set up, this was mostly basic questions about experience and incentives in applying for the position. After the phone-screen, the information is passed onto the Hiring Manager and if they see fit they schedule a phone interview with you.
Interview Questions: Describe a situation where you were faced with a conflict in the work environment and how you handled it.

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Park Place Post Office, GA) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: Don't get an interview if you are not prepared! You will struggle, make sure your experience is concurrent with the position you are applying for.  Know your stuff like the back of your hand, they will call you out on it, if you don't.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work at TMH?

title: Patient Account Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL)
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was easy. Were only concerned with past few jobs. The interviewers were laid back and easy going for this interview. I really did much of the talking which was kind of awkward . They called me back very quickly. Be prepared to submit reference letters from previous employers. Also expect an in depth background check. Orientation was fun and lasted two days . After that your on your own.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in five years

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL) in Aug 2014
Interview Descriptions: The nursing recruiter did a wonderful job at finding a perfect fit for you according to your resume and experience.  I interviewed  with several nurse managers and all of them were very professional and personable.  The asked typical interviewing questions, and also made sure to make time to give me a tour of the units and also time to speak to current employees.
Interview Questions: My strongest quality as a nurse?

title: Public Relations Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 6 weeks. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL) in Dec 2013
Interview Descriptions: I initially reached out to the Director of Communication and was quickly contacted by one of the Marketing Coordinators. I interviewed and was offered the internship on the same day. The on-boarding process (paperwork, vaccines) was lengthy. Plan for about 2 weeks processing time.
Interview Questions: What are you interested in learning?

title: CPA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL) in Feb 2013
Interview Descriptions: Brief questions only lasted about 20 minutes, stated that they had 2 other interviews. but i was called back in 3 days. had to meet with hr and then wait for orientation.
Interview Questions: What do you like to do, what was your previous job?

title: Cardiac Rehab Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL) in Jan 2013
Interview Descriptions: Great experience with the department head.  He really new his position and I felt he was passionate about his field.  He really made me feel at ease with the position.  When the interview was over, I really wanted to work in the department.  I accepted the position and have never doubted this is where I belong.
Interview Questions: 5 year plan

title: Department Secretary Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL) in May 2010
Interview Descriptions: After applying online, I did not hear anything for two weeks. I called the hospital operator, found the phone number to my unit and got the name of who was in charge of hiring new employees. I asked what time would that person be at work, and when would be most convenient, and took the name of the person I spoke with over the phone. I called back at their convenience - mentioned the name of the person I spoke with initially - and spoke with the person in charge of hiring, who offered me a phone interview. The phone interview led to an in-person interview, and I was offered the position at the end of the interview.
Interview Questions: Are you experienced with telemetry and do you feel comfortable reading heart monitors?

title: Customer Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare (Tallahassee, FL) in Jan 2010
Interview Descriptions: Just go to the main desk, ask for an application and turn it in completely filled out. The HR person will call you if your application fits the bill, which depends on what you're applying for...if you are applying for the CSR or sales, you must have good customer service experience. I had 3 interviews total, one with just the HR person, one with HR and the front desk manager and then one with the director. Very easy, just be upfront and smile a lot.
Interview Questions: Why should we hire you?
